task.title: Best Practices for Using Orchestrate with Flow and Process Builder
task.shortdesc: When using Flow and Process Builder, use Salesforce best practices for code, as these tools are a nice user interface to code that executes behind the scenes. For example, insert all records of the same object type in one insert, just as you would in code. Even if you are using sub-flows, try to do one insert. Additionally, avoid another update to the same object in the same transaction.

taskbody.context: There are several more best practices to consider as you use these tools. Review the resources below as you design flows or build processes to work with Orchestrate-managed processes.
